comment.body:
One of Reddit's big men, Mod (equivalent to the bar owner), asked the station to manage the rumors of an outbreak. The big man, who has more than 300 head subs ( equivalent to bar ) , posted on r\/vaxxhappened claiming that the rumors were so abominable that Reddit administrators needed to take responsibility for cracking down on rumors and banning subs that spread them .
But some people also think that one is to follow the evil path of the Communist Party of China, betraying democratic freedom. There are even fears that the big man will use the outbreak to attack his dissidents.
What do you think?
